result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for parsing a Go source file and looking up identifiers in the innermost scope of comments.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, focusing on parsing and type checking within the Go programming language.

gotypes/lookup/lookup.go.purpose: This file parses a Go source file and looks up identifiers in the innermost scope of comments.
side_effects: Logs errors if parsing or type checking fails.
risks: Potential for code injection if input is not sanitized.
